General.Name: Shandong Longquan Pipeline Engineering Co Ltd
General.Description: Shandong Longquan Pipe Industry Co.,Ltd produces and sells prestressed concrete cylinder pipes in China. It also offers reinforced concrete, jacking construction, and armored joint prestressed concrete cylinder pipes. The company was formerly known as Shandong Longquan Pipeline Engineering Co.,LTD and changed its name to Shandong Longquan Pipe Industry Co.,Ltd in July 2023. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Zibo, China.
General.Address: No. 36, Jianshan East Road, Zibo, China, 255200
